author: diguida
body:
The configuration file `CondTools/RunInfo/test/RunInfoPopConAnalyzer.py` is now in `CondTools/RunInfo/python/`. This allows to launch O2O jobs from a base release area, without checking out a local developer area.

Back-port of #15749
title: Copy the configuration file for RunInfo PopCon analyser in python subfolder (80X).
